Text: I'm looking for a copy of the 4th, and 7th or 8th editions.
Nice. This should run great on my 486 then? Including the installprog at the root hehe... (Since I have DOS 6.22/win3.11 on that machine) :D:D:D:D:D

I think I was running PC-DOS 3.3 when I used a lot of the programs on this CD. Ah, for the days when you had to go bother the librarian at a major university to get access to those "expensive new CD drives."

Should run fine on your PCjr...
